word_mean: ［拉］镫骨：最里面的耳骨，形状很像(马)镫，其头部和砧骨连接，底部插入前庭窗

sentence.Network_en: The fixation of the stapes may progress rapidly during pregnancy.
sentence.Network_cn: 在怀孕期镫骨固定可能迅速发展.

sentence.Network_en: The height of stapes was measured with the oblique MPR.
sentence.Network_cn: 在镫骨斜位mpr图像上测量镫骨的高度.

sentence.Network_en: Her stapes had a atrophic neck and appeared pale.
sentence.Network_cn: 手术见镫骨头在颈部与足弓脱离,足板活动,镫骨苍白.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 镫骨（stapes）又称 stirrup, 最后一块听小骨。耳蜗（cochlea）中耳中的蜗牛状结构，具有听觉转换的机制。

list.abs: 2.镫骨撼动术(Stapes Mobilization)  适用于病程早期Ⅰ或Ⅱ型,病灶局限于足板前缘,撼动时使前足在病灶上折断,足板在病灶之后断裂,使后足与折断的足板连在一起.
the surgical management of congenital stapes malformation ., 先天性镫骨畸形的外科治疗.
stapes mobilization 镫骨撼动术stapes surgery 镫骨手术static compliance value 静态声顺值

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: modern Latin, from medieval Latin stapes 'stirrup'

means.word_mean: 1. the stirrup-shaped ossicle that transmits sound from the incus to the cochlea
